title: Swiss finance faces "manageable" first-round effects from Ukraine conflict, financial market supervisor says - Reuters
content: Swiss finance faces "manageable" first-round effects from Ukraine conflict, financial market supervisor says  Reuters
description: While Swiss financial firms' business ties to Russia are "not insignificant", financial market supervisor FINMA does not currently foresee a wide-scale threat to the Swiss financial market and its stability due to Russia's invasion of Ukraine, FINMA's new boss said on Tuesday.
